Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.FoodDeliveryManagementSystem.Presentation.BaseController
com.FoodDeliveryManagementSystem.Presentation.ClientController
public class ClientController
extends BaseController
the controller which controlls the ui of the client.

  • Method Details

    • filteredList

      public java.util.List<MenuItem> filteredList()
      a method which returns the original menu item list, but filtered based on the criterion specified from the textfields. if the textfield is empty, the items will not get filtered based on that criterion.
      Returns:
      the list of items after the original products list has been filtered.
